open_response.description: The text 'open response' in the page title

question.description: The text 'question' in the step header, right above where the prompt/question is shown

your_response.description: The text 'Your Response' right above the textbox where the student types in their response

save_changes.description: The text 'SAVE CHANGES' on the button shown at the bottom of the step

save_and_close.description: The text 'SAVE & CLOSE' on the button shown at the bottom of the step

tall.description: The text 'tall' on the button shown at the top of the note step to change the note to be tall

wide.description: The text 'wide' on the button shown at the top of the note step to change the note to be wide

basic.description: The text 'basic' on the button shown at the top of the note step to change the note to be the default basic size

large.description: The text 'large' on the button shown at the top of the note step to change the note to be large

show_hide.description: The text for the button that shows and hides text

original_question.description: The text 'Original Question' to show above the original question for the step in peer-review mode

associated_work.description: The text 'Associated Work' to show above the associated work for the step in peer-review mode

question_is_hidden.description: The text to show when the question is hidden

text_is_hidden.description: The text to show when the text is hidden

show_starter_sentence.description: The text for the show starter sentence button

your_previous_response.description: The label for the student's previous response

submit_and_lock.description: The text for the submit and lock button

check_answer.description: The label for the check answer in the grading view

you_have.description: The beginning of the popup message when the student is submitting their work to the auto grader

chances.description: The text to show the student has x chances left to submit

chance.description: The text to show the student has 1 chance left to submit

to_receive_feedback.description: The end of the popup message when the student is submitting their work to the auto grader
to_receive_feedback.value: تلقي ملاحظات حول إجابتك لذا يجب أن تقدم أفضل ما لديك في العمل!

are_you_ready_to_receive_feedback.description: The text for the popup message when the student is submitting their work to the auto grader
are_you_ready_to_receive_feedback.value: هل أنت مستعد لتلقي ملاحظات حول إجابتك؟

if_you_are_ready.description: The reminder to the student that they should click the check answer button if they are ready to check their work
if_you_are_ready.value: إذا كنت مستعدًا للتحقق من إجابتك، فانقر فوق الزر "التحقق من الإجابة".

you_will_not_be_able_to_make_edits_after.description: The message to ask the student if they are sure they want to submit
you_will_not_be_able_to_make_edits_after.value: لن تكون قادرًا على عمل أي تعديلات أخرى بعد إرسال هذا الرد. هل أنت جاهز للإرسال؟

please_wait_we_are_checking_your_work.description: The message to display while the auto grader analyzes their work
please_wait_we_are_checking_your_work.value: يرجى الانتظار، جارٍ التحقق عملك. سوف تختفي شاشة الانتظار في غضون

seconds.description: The end of the message to display while the auto grader analyzes their work

you_have_successfully_reviewed.description: The message to tell the student they have reviewed the work submitted by a classmate
you_have_successfully_reviewed.value: لقد راجعت بنجاح العمل المرسل بواسطة

team_anonymous.description: The label to show the work is from an anonymous classmate

well_done.description: The well done message to display after the student has submitted work

your_feedback_for.description: The label to show that the student is writing feedback for another group

prompt_from_the_first_peer_review_step.description: The place holder text to show that the prompt from the first peer review step will display here
prompt_from_the_first_peer_review_step.value: سيظهر الطلب المستخلص من خطوة مراجعة النظير الأولى هنا

work_submitted_by.description: The label to show that the work was submitted by another group

work_from_a_random_classmate_will_displa.description: The place holder text to show that the work from another group will display here
work_from_a_random_classmate_will_displa.value: سوف يعرض عمل أحد زملاء الفصل الدراسي

your_second_draft.description: The label for the second draft

your_original_response.description: The label to show the original answer the student submitted

show_hide_text.description: The label for the show/hide text button

students_work_from_first_peer_review_ste.description: The place holder for where the student work from the first peer review step will display
students_work_from_first_peer_review_ste.value: سوف يعرض هنا عمل الطالب من مراجعة أول زميل

has_given_you_the_following_feedback.description: The label for the feedback that another group has given them

feedback_from_classmate_or_teacher.description: The place holder for where the feedback will display
feedback_from_classmate_or_teacher.value: ملاحظات زميل الفصل الدراسي أو المعلم سوف تظهر هنا

to_start_this_step.description: The message to display when the student hasn't submitted a response in a previous step in a peer review sequence
to_start_this_step.value: لبدء هذه الخطوة يجب أولًا إرسال رد في الخطوة

link.description: The text to specify something is a link

your_teacher_has_not_yet.description: The message to display when the teacher has not given the student feedback yet in a teacher review sequence
your_teacher_has_not_yet.value: لم يراجع معلمك حتى الآن الرد المرسل في الخطوة

yet.description: The end of the message to display when the teacher has not given the student feedback yet in a teacher review sequence

please_return_later.description: The message to tell the student to come back later
please_return_later.value: يرجى الرجوع إلى هذه الخطوة لاحقًا.

your_first_response.description: The label for the first response the student submitted

teacher_feedback.description: The label for the teacher feedback

this_is_revision_x.description: Message to display to student which revision they're on

this_step_not_available_yet.description: The message that tells the student that the step is not available yet
this_step_not_available_yet.value: هذه الخطوة غير متوفرة حتى الآن.

more_of_your_peers_need_to_submit.description: The message that says more of their classmates need to submit a response in order for this step to open
more_of_your_peers_need_to_submit.value: يحتاج الكثير من زملائك إلى إرسال رد لهذه الخطوة

you_will_then_be_assigned.description: The message that says they will be assigned to a response to review

please_return_in_a_few_minutes.description: The message to tell the student to come back to the step later
please_return_in_a_few_minutes.value: يرجى الرجوع إلى هذه الخطوة بعد بضع دقائق.

please_return_to_step.description: The beginning of the message that tells the student to return to step x in a few minutes

in_a_few_minutes.description: The end of the message that tells the student to return to step x in a few minutes

your_response_in_step.description: The beginning of the message that says their response in step x has not been reviewed yet

has_not_been_reviewed.description: The end of the message that says their response in step x has not been reviewed yet
has_not_been_reviewed.value: لم يُراجع بعد من أي من الزملاء.

there_is_no_starter_sentence.description: The message that says there is no starter sentence
there_is_no_starter_sentence.value: لا يوجد جملة بدء مخصصة لهذه الخطوة

responses_from_peers_not_available.description: The message that says responses from the classmates are not available yet
responses_from_peers_not_available.value: ردود زملائك غير متوفرة حتى الآن.

save_answer.description: The label for the save answer in the grading view

auto_score.description: The label for the auto score in the grading view

auto_feedback.description: The label for the auto feedback in the grading view
